help-file.title: RANGER
help-file.content:
Rangers are Fighters who are trained and skilled at woodland survival and techniques. They are one with nature and they are the best in the world at two-weapon combat. Although, Rangers are not quite as generally skilled in battle as Warriors are, they have the advantage of possessing limited spell-casting abilities. These abilities are granted to them once they progress upward in level and become powerful enough to use the magic as a reward for their mastery of woodland survival.
Allowable races: Human, Grey Elf, Half-Elf, Centaur Innate abilities: Outdoor Sneak Equipment usage: Rangers have their own classification of item restriction. They can use almost all weapons and most types of armor. They are somewhat limited in their use of miscellaneous magical items.
NOTE: Rangers must stay good aligned or else they lose their magical abilities until they mend their ways.
